name: Don of the Dead
description:
In life, you probably got tangled up with the wrong people. Or you got iced because you were wearing the wrong hat, in the wrong place, at the wrong time. That doesn't matter now - because all you have in the underbelly of the underworld is that same godforsaken hat and a mission: get to the top of this and get out.

Build the best deck you can and collect fashion to improve your deck's effectiveness, as you contend with a variety of skeletal strong-arms and ghoulish goons on your way to the top. And maybe you can be the next...

Don of the Dead.
